channel.title: CVE Feed for Akeo Consulting -- Rufus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Akeo Consulting -- Rufus

item.title: CVE-2017-13083|2024-08-05T18:58:12.360Z -- akeo%20consulting -- rufus
item.description: Akeo Consulting Rufus prior to version 2.17.1187 does not adequately validate the integrity of updates downloaded over HTTP, allowing an attacker to easily convince a user to execute arbitrary code

item.title: CVE-2019-1010101|2024-08-05T03:07:18.332Z -- akeo%20consulting -- rufus
item.description: Akeo Consulting Rufus 3.0 and earlier is affected by: Insecure Permissions. The impact is: arbitrary code execution with escalation of privilege. The component is: Executable installer, portable executable (ALL executables available). The attack vector is: CWE-29, CWE-377, CWE-379.

item.title: CVE-2019-1010100|2024-08-05T03:07:18.327Z -- akeo%20consulting -- rufus
item.description: Akeo Consulting Rufus 3.0 and earlier is affected by: DLL search order hijacking. The impact is: Arbitrary code execution WITH escalation of privilege. The component is: Executable installers, portable executables (ALL executables on the web site). The attack vector is: CAPEC-471, CWE-426, CWE-427.
